name: Falling Spiders
description:
Recommended Hardware Acceleration!
If the game is lagging, you can download and test it!

This game was made for a Game Jam called Mini Jam 123, the theme was "Web" and the limitation was "No ground" made in three days.

With the left button mouse, you can catch the spiders, but watch out for the lizards! It can destroy the web cocoons and make you lose the game!

Credits:
Naoki (Programming/Sound Design)
Kamus(Music)
Kamus is a brazilian content creator, you can check his work here: https://www.tiktok.com/@kamuuska
